positions.subtitle: Yumlane
positions.description: • Working closely with Business teams to analyse Contribution Margin (aggregator-wise).• Preparing & presenting MIS to the management.• Reviewing provision entries passed by the team for monthly closure of accounts.• Capital Investment Proposals - Responsible for analysing Capital investment proposals for the company.• Preparing revenue projection & doing variance analysis• Preparing Cash Runway plans for the company.• Variance Analysis - Analyze and interpret monthly variances and trends between budgets vs actuals.• Due Delligence - Handle Due Delligence for the company (FDD & LDD) for Pre series A round.• Preparing FoCo & CoCo models for franchising.• Key Skills : Forecasting, Budgeting, Planning, Bench-marking, Management Reporting,Variance Analysis, Using Advance Excel
positions.title: Manager - Business Finance
positions.description_html:
• Working closely with Business teams to analyse Contribution Margin (aggregator-wise).
• Preparing & presenting MIS to the management.
• Reviewing provision entries passed by the team for monthly closure of accounts.
• Capital Investment Proposals - Responsible for analysing Capital investment proposals for the company.
• Preparing revenue projection & doing variance analysis
• Preparing Cash Runway plans for the company.
• Variance Analysis - Analyze and interpret monthly variances and trends between budgets vs actuals.
• Due Delligence - Handle Due Delligence for the company (FDD & LDD) for Pre series A round.
• Preparing FoCo & CoCo models for franchising.
• Key Skills : Forecasting, Budgeting, Planning, Bench-marking, Management Reporting,Variance Analysis, Using Advance Excel
